channel.title: Asteroid Thermal Modeling on Michael Mommert
channel.description: Recent content in Asteroid Thermal Modeling on Michael Mommert

item.title: SpitzerNEOs - Diameters and Albedos for 2132 Near-Earth Objects
item.description: Based on Spitzer Space Telescope observations, we derived diameter and albedo estimates for 2132 asteroids in near-Earth space - the largest dataset of its kind. Our results and data are available online.

item.title: Are there Limits on the Applicability of Asteroid Thermal Models for Near-Earth Asteroids?
item.description: There is a range of asteroid thermal models that are based on different physical assumptions. In this analysis, I investigate how these assumptions affect their results and applicability to different situations.
